data.title: Kireka, Uganda to Silapathar, India
data.meta_description: Time conversion from EAT (Eastern Africa Time) (+3) to IST (India Standard Time)(+5:30). Kireka, Uganda to Silapathar, India time zones converter, calculator, table and map.
data.text:
Time Difference

EAT (Eastern Africa Time) is 2 hours and 30 minutes behind IST (India Standard Time)

1:30 pm13:30 in Kireka, Uganda is 4:00 pm16:00 in Silapathar, India

Kireka to Silapathar call time

Best time for a conference call or a meeting is between 8am-3:30pm in Kireka which corresponds to 10:30am-6pm in Silapathar

1:30 pm13:30 EAT (Eastern Africa Time) (Kireka, Uganda). Offset UTC +3:00 hours

4:00 pm16:00 IST (India Standard Time) (Silapathar, India). Offset UTC +5:30 hours

1:30 pm13:30 Kireka, Uganda / 4:00 pm16:00 Silapathar, India
